subject: Soul OS Infrastructure Refinement & Documentation Closure
description: Finalize merge of README updates (PR #9). Begin preparation for Soul-to-LoRA (S2L) implementation phase, including synthetic data generation scripts.

history.summary: Initializing next phase post-cleanup. Focus on documentation closure and S2L implementation prep.
